text: Bigu (ej Pajomʙar, in suxanamro ʙaroi mu'minon): «Ej ʙandagoni Man, ki imon ovardaed, az Parvardigoraton ʙitarsed ʙo ancom dodani amrhojas va dur ʙudan az man'kardasudahojas. Baroi onon, ki dar hajoti incahoni neki kardaand, podosi nek ast, ki on cannat ast. Va zamini Alloh vase' ast, pas ʙa on coe hicrat kuned, ki dar on Parvardigoratonro iʙodat kuned va ʙitavoned dini xudro ʙarpo dored. Haqiqatan, ʙa saʙrkunandagon muzdason purra va ʙehisoʙ doda mesavad!»
